attributes.action: Stop Needless Financial Favouritism for Disabled
attributes.additional_details: Stop penalizing able bodied citizens. Disabled people should be given assistance financially to get them mobile, but if they choose to use their mobility to purchase a vehicle often better than many able bodied people can afford. Why should they also be given FREE PARKING and FREE ROAD TAX everybody else who pays towards their allowances which are hundreds of pounds a month has to pay for the costs of road marking and signing as well why should disabled not contribute with the rest of us?
